"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5503a19f6368723fc3d60000#post_5503a19f6368723fc3d60000
Cook-Man has saved the day again!

By the way, about the little cat, sorry about the loss man, I know the feel about loosing a kitty in a very early age. 
But you said the kitty had just a week, right? Well, I can only say that a pet in that age requieres milk from the mother, and a formula is not enough to satisfy the young one, so there is a little change of survival when they are in that age.
